languages.text: "Порой так оно и есть". {n}Ирлиэт опускает веки, словно погружаясь в воспоминания.{/n} "Даже руины давно забытых миров хранят в себе истории прошлого и тех, кто был до нас".
"Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."
languages.original_text: "Порой так оно и есть". {n}Ирлиэт опускает веки, словно погружаясь в воспоминания.{/n} "Даже руины давно забытых миров хранят в себе истории прошлого и тех, кто был до нас".

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."
"Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."
"Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."
"Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

languages.text: «A veces es así». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos, como perdiéndose en un recuerdo.{/n} «Incluso las ruinas de mundos largo tiempo olvidados encierran historias del pasado y de quienes nos precedieron».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

traits.locale_text: «A veces es así». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos, como perdiéndose en un recuerdo.{/n} «Incluso las ruinas de mundos largo tiempo olvidados encierran historias del pasado y de quienes nos precedieron».

languages.text: 「そういう時もあるだろう」{n}ユリエットは記憶に浸るように目を閉じた。{/n}「はるか昔に忘れ去られた惑星の廃墟でさえ、過去や先人たちの物語を包み込んででいるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

traits.locale_text: 「そういう時もあるだろう」{n}ユリエットは記憶に浸るように目を閉じた。{/n}「はるか昔に忘れ去られた惑星の廃墟でさえ、過去や先人たちの物語を包み込んででいるのだ」

languages.text: “有时是会这样。”{n}伊莉耶特闭上双眼，仿佛陷入了回忆。{/n}“即使是被人们遗忘已久的世界的废墟，也驻留了无数昔日与前人的故事。”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

traits.locale_text: “有时是会这样。”{n}伊莉耶特闭上双眼，仿佛陷入了回忆。{/n}“即使是被人们遗忘已久的世界的废墟，也驻留了无数昔日与前人的故事。”

languages.text: « Il en va parfois ainsi. » {n}Yrliet ferme les yeux comme si elle plongeait dans un souvenir.{/n} « Même les ruines de mondes depuis longtemps oubliés abritent des souvenirs du passé et de ceux qui nous ont précédés. »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

traits.locale_text: « Il en va parfois ainsi. » {n}Yrliet ferme les yeux comme si elle plongeait dans un souvenir.{/n} « Même les ruines de mondes depuis longtemps oubliés abritent des souvenirs du passé et de ceux qui nous ont précédés. »

languages.text: "Manchmal ist das so." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen, als würde sie in einer Erinnerung versinken.{/n} "Selbst die Ruinen längst vergessener Welten enthalten die Geschichten der Vergangenheit und derer, die vor uns kamen."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal ist das so." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen, als würde sie in einer Erinnerung versinken.{/n} "Selbst die Ruinen längst vergessener Welten enthalten die Geschichten der Vergangenheit und derer, die vor uns kamen."

languages.text: "Bazen hayat böyledir." {n}Yrliet, bir anısını hatırlarmış gibi gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Uzun zaman önce unutulan dünyaların harabelerinde bile geçmişin ve bizden önce gelenlerin hikâyeleri saklıdır."
languages.original_text: "Sometimes it is so." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes as though she is sinking into a memory.{/n} "Even the ruins of long-forgotten worlds contain the stories of the past and of those who came before us."

traits.locale_text: "Bazen hayat böyledir." {n}Yrliet, bir anısını hatırlarmış gibi gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Uzun zaman önce unutulan dünyaların harabelerinde bile geçmişin ve bizden önce gelenlerin hikâyeleri gizlenir."
